questions.question_text: Which two tools are used for centralized logging in VMware NSX? (Choose two.)

An administrator has a requirement to have consistent policy configuration and enforcement across NSX instances.

What feature of NSX fulfills this requirement?

discussion.content:
get logical-switch <logical-switch-id>

Replication mode : unicast mtep
Transport binding : GENEVE

Selected Answer: D
Agree with Nubee. Correct answer is D

Selected Answer: D
Agree with Nubee. In this form only D.

https://vdc-download.vmware.com/vmwb-repository/dcr-public/c3fd9cef-6b2b-4772-93be-3fe60ce064a1/1f67b9e1-b111-4de7-9ea1-39931d28f560/NSX-T%20Command-Line%20Interface%20Reference.html#get%20logical-switch%20%3Clogical-switch-id%3E

C is not 100% right as it needs switch ID to display information.
A and B is out.

Correct answer is D "get logical-switches"
example nsx-edge-1> get logical-switches
Logical Switch
UUID : ea8c4460-6d15-49c5-a82e-6812a26b4200
VNI : 5001
ENCAP : STT
Replication : mtep

See https://vdc-download.vmware.com/vmwb-repository/dcr-public/c3fd9cef-6b2b-4772-93be-3fe60ce064a1/1f67b9e1-b111-4de7-9ea1-39931d28f560/NSX-T%20Command-Line%20Interface%20Reference.html#get%20logical-switch%20%3Clogical-switch-id%3E

the question is wrong.
confirmed that answer is get logical-switch <logical-switch-id>
C is the closest to this so likely the correct answer

Selected Answer: B
get logical-switch <logical-switch-id>
<logical-switch-id> is missing in the Answers A and B

questions.question_text: When running nsxcli on an ESXi host, which command will show the Replication mode?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
correct answer is A & C

Selected Answer: CE
You need to create IP Pool or use DHCP server

Selected Answer: AC
IP address is assigned to the NSX Edge switch that is configured. It is used as the tunnel endpoint of the NSX Edge.

Select Use IP Pool or Use Static IP List for the overlay N-VDS.
If you select Use Static IP List, specify:
Static IP List: Enter a list of comma-separated IP addresses to be used by the NSX Edge.
Gateway: Enter the default gateway of the TEP, which is used to route packets another TEP in another network. For eample, ESXi TEP is in 20.20.20.0/24 and NSX Edge TEPs are in 10.10.10.0/24 then we use the default gateway to route packets between these networks.
Subnet mask: Enter the subnet mask of the TEP network used on the NSX Edge.
If you selected Use IP Pool for IP assignment, specify the IP pool name.

questions.question_text: When deploying an NSX Edge Transport Node, what two valid IP address assignment options should be specified for the TEP IP addresses? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
suppress duration must be an integer between 1 to 24. Minimum is 1 hour.

Selected Answer: A
Can be suppressed for Hours

Selected Answer: A
A. An alarm can be suppressed for a specific duration in hours.

questions.question_text: Which statement is true about an alarm in a Suppressed state?

choices.C: An alarm can be suppressed for a specific duration in minutes.
choices.B: An alarm can be suppressed for a specific duration in seconds.
choices.A: An alarm can be suppressed for a specific duration in hours.
choices.D: An alarm can be suppressed for a specific duration in days.
